price: 150. Allah azali mosungi wa bino. Mpe ye azali mosungi ya malamu.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
